page.title: 01Felton and Ocle Pychard Area
page.content: The area surveyed covers the parishes of Felton, Preston Wynne, Ullingswick and Ocle Pychard, ten miles north-east of Hereford. The area is one of mixed farming. There are eleven farms over twenty hectares, and fourteen under twenty hectares. The region contains three complete villages, Felton, Burley Gate and Ocle Pychard, and parts of the villages of Preston Wynne and Ullingswick. Three hundred and fifty adults and fifty children live here. There is also a Post Office, Garage, Primary School and Police Station at Burley Gate. The Post Office and Garage also sell groceries. The farms are chiefly for dairying, and growing of cereals, potatoes and hops.
